## Editor.Rules.IMultiValuePropertyParts.asArray property

If `true`<!-- -->, the resolved values are added as an array with the name of the [propertyVariable](./ts-json.editor.rules.imultivaluepropertyparts.propertyvariable.md)<!-- -->. If false, values are added as individual properties with names that correspond the value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly asArray: boolean;
```
